item.title: About Us
item.description: Temeraire 1798 is a specialist IT consulting business with a focus on architecture, strategy and robust engineering for the modern age. Our aim is simple: help our clients to deliver

item.title: Consulting Services
item.description: The services we provide are: Architecure consultancy (Enterprise Architecture, Solution Architecture, TOGAF, modelling, strategy, stakeholder engagement) Software engineering consultancy (Agile adoption, automation, Quality Assurance, methods, tools) Digital transformation (APIs, DevOps, e-commerce, governance) Modern web and mobile app development and testing (the application of platform agnostic best practices) Please contact us today for more information
